Song.title: I Will Cast My Cares
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Stephen Altrogge © 2007 Sovereign Grace Praise

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [G2 | G2 | Am2 | Am2 | D | D | C | C]
Verse 1: Jesus, I’[G2]m frail, I’m so very[Am] weak My faithfulness[D] fails,{,} my courage will[C2] flee But You are my[G2] rock,{,} my shelter and[Am] shade When I’m burdened[D] down, You’ll carry the[C2] weight
Chorus: So I will [G2]cast my [D/F#]cares on [C]You Yes, I will [Em7]cast my [D/F#]cares on [C]You [| D] I will [Em]rest within Your [D/F#]arms Knowing [G]I am safe from [Am7]harm [Bm7]I will cast my [C]cares on [G2 (to intro)]You
Verse 2: When I’m over[G2]whelmed{,} and I cannot[Am] stand You hear every[D] cry and You lift my[C2] head I’m desperate for[G2] grace and mercy a[Am]new I must have Your[D] strength,{,} oh I must have[C2] You
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 jesus im frail im so very weak my faithfulness fails my courage will flee but you are my rock my shelter and shade when im burdened down youll carry the weight chorus so i will cast my cares on you yes i will cast my cares on you i will rest within your arms knowing i am safe from harm i will cast my cares on you verse 2 when im overwhelmed and i cannot stand you hear every cry and you lift my head im desperate for grace and mercy anew i must have your strength oh i must have you
